description: Starting and stopping, seeking rhythm. Let's find your flow.

art.title: Rhythm Pattern Creation
art.instruction: Create repeating patterns that represent consistency and flow.
art.affirmation: I create steady rhythms and patterns in my life

art.title: Flow State Art
art.instruction: Create art while in flow state - let creativity move through you consistently.
art.affirmation: I access flow state and move with natural consistency

breathwork.title: Consistent Rhythm Breathing
breathwork.instruction: Establish steady, consistent breathing rhythm and maintain for entire session.
breathwork.affirmation: I establish consistent rhythms that support my goals

breathwork.title: Commitment Breathing
breathwork.instruction: With each breath, commit to one small consistent action.
breathwork.affirmation: I commit to small, consistent actions that create positive change

somatic.title: Daily Movement Ritual
somatic.instruction: Create simple movement sequence you can do consistently every day.
somatic.affirmation: I show up for myself through consistent, caring movement

cbt.title: Consistency Barrier Analysis
cbt.instruction: Examine what stops you from being consistent. Address barriers systematically.
cbt.affirmation: I identify and overcome barriers to consistency

rebt.title: Perfect Consistency Demand
rebt.instruction: Challenge 'I must be perfectly consistent.' Allow for human flexibility.
rebt.affirmation: I strive for consistency while accepting my human flexibility

neural.title: Consistent Identity Programming
neural.instruction: Visualize yourself as naturally consistent person. Install this identity.
neural.affirmation: I am naturally consistent and follow through on my commitments

journaling.title: Consistency Success Journal
journaling.instruction: Write about times you were successfully consistent. Build on these patterns.
journaling.affirmation: I build on my history of successful consistency

eft.title: Consistency Tapping
eft.instruction: Tap: 'Even though I struggle with consistency, I choose to show up for myself daily.'
eft.affirmation: I choose consistency and trust in my ability to show up

emdr.title: Consistent Success Installation
emdr.instruction: Install memories of successful consistency through bilateral stimulation.
emdr.affirmation: I carry the energy of successful consistency within me

yoga.title: Daily Practice Commitment
yoga.instruction: Commit to simple daily yoga sequence. Consistency over perfection.
yoga.affirmation: I commit to consistent practice and honor my dedication
